original_text: The Lord is your Redeemer, Israel's Holy God. He says, ‘I am the Lord your God. I teach you what will be good for you. I lead you along a good path in life. The Lord is your Redeemer, Israel's Holy God. He says,
korean_text: 너희의 구속자시요 이스라엘의 거룩하신 이이신 여호와께서 이르시되 나는 네게 유익하도록 가르치고 너를 마땅히 행할 길로 인도하는 네 하나님 여호와라

sentences.original_text: what will be good for you.
along a good path in life.'
